View Javadoc
1   package com.googlecode.download.maven.plugin.internal.cache;
2   
3   import org.apache.http.Header;
4   import org.apache.http.HttpHeaders;
5   import org.apache.http.StatusLine;
6   import org.apache.http.client.cache.HeaderConstants;
7   import org.apache.http.client.cache.HttpCacheEntry;
8   import org.apache.http.client.cache.HttpCacheStorage;
9   import org.apache.http.client.cache.HttpCacheUpdateCallback;
10  import org.apache.http.client.utils.DateUtils;
11  import org.apache.http.client.utils.URIBuilder;
12  import org.apache.http.message.BasicHeader;
13  import org.apache.http.message.BasicStatusLine;
14  import org.apache.http.util.Args;
15  import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log;
16  
17  import javax.annotation.concurrent.ThreadSafe;
18  import java.io.*;
19  import java.net.URI;
20  import java.net.URISyntaxException;
21  import java.nio.channels.FileChannel;
22  import java.nio.channels.FileLock;
23  import java.nio.file.*;
24  import java.time.Instant;
25  import java.util.Date;
26  import java.util.HashMap;
27  import java.util.Map;
28  import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
29  import java.util.regex.Matcher;
30  import java.util.regex.Pattern;
31  import java.util.stream.Collectors;
32  
33  import static java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit.DAYS;
34  import static org.apache.http.HttpStatus.SC_OK;
35  import static org.apache.http.HttpVersion.HTTP_1_1;
36  
37  /**
38   * Persistent cache implementation of the {@link HttpCacheStorage} interface,
39   * to be used with the Apache HttpClient Cache, using a directory with
40   * the copy of the files and a serialized file map.
41   *
42   * @author Paul Polishchuk
43   * @since 1.3.1
44   */
45  @ThreadSafe
46  public final class FileBackedIndex implements HttpCacheStorage {
47  
48      private static final Pattern URI_REGEX = Pattern.compile("^(?:\\{.*})?([^/]+//?.*)$");
49      private static final String CACHE_FILENAME = "index.ser";
50      private final static StatusLine OK_STATUS_LINE = new BasicStatusLine(HTTP_1_1, SC_OK, "OK");
51      private final Map<URI, String> index = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
52      private final Path cacheIndexFile;
53      private final Log log;
54      private final Path baseDir;
55  
56      private static HttpCacheEntry asHttpCacheEntry( Path path, Path cacheDir) {
57          Date lastModifiedDate;
58          try {
59              lastModifiedDate = Date.from(Files.getLastModifiedTime(path, LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS).toInstant());
60          } catch (IOException e) {
61              lastModifiedDate = Date.from(Instant.now());
62          }
63          return new HttpCacheEntry(lastModifiedDate, Date.from(Instant.now()), OK_STATUS_LINE,
64                  new Header[] { new BasicHeader(HttpHeaders.DATE, DateUtils.formatDate(lastModifiedDate)),
65                  new BasicHeader(HeaderConstants.CACHE_CONTROL_MAX_AGE, String.valueOf(Integer.MAX_VALUE)),
66                  new BasicHeader(HeaderConstants.EXPIRES,
67                          DateUtils.formatDate(Date.from(Instant.now().plus(365, DAYS))))},
68                  new FileIndexResource(path, cacheDir));
69      }
70  
71      private static Path asPath( HttpCacheEntry entry) {
72          return ((FileIndexResource) entry.getResource()).getPath();
73      }
74  
75      /**
76       * Creates index backed by file "index.ser" in baseDir.
77       * Throws runtime exceptions if baseDir does not exist, not a directory
78       * or file can't be created in it.
79       * @param baseDir directory where the index file should be stored.
80       */
81      public FileBackedIndex(final Path baseDir, Log log) throws NotDirectoryException {
82          this.log = log;
83          this.baseDir = baseDir;
84          this.cacheIndexFile = Paths.get(baseDir.toString(), CACHE_FILENAME);
85      }
86  
87      protected static URI asUri(String key) {
88          Matcher uriMatcher = URI_REGEX.matcher(key);
89          if (uriMatcher.find()) {
90              try {
91                  return normalize(URI.create(uriMatcher.group(1)));
92              } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
93                  return null;
94              }
95          }
96          return null;
97      }
98  
99      private static URI normalize(final URI requestUri) throws URISyntaxException {
100         Args.notNull(requestUri, "URI");
101         final URIBuilder builder = new URIBuilder(requestUri) ;
102         if (builder.getHost() != null) {
103             if (builder.getScheme() == null) {
104                 builder.setScheme("http");
105             }
106             if (builder.getPort() > -1) {
107                 builder.setPort(-1);
108             }
109         }
110         builder.setFragment(null);
111         return builder.build();
112     }
113 
114     @Override
115     public void putEntry(String key, HttpCacheEntry entry) throws IOException {
116         URI uri = asUri(key);
117         if (uri != null) {
118             log.debug("Putting \"" + uri + "\" into cache");
119             this.index.put(uri, asPath(entry).toString());
120             try {
121                 this.load(cacheIndexFile);
122             } catch (IncompatibleIndexException e) {
123                 log.warn("Could not load index cache index file, it will be rewritten.");
124             }
125             this.save();
126         } else {
127             log.warn("Could not extract an URI from key: " + key);
128         }
129     }
130 
131     @Override
132     public HttpCacheEntry getEntry(String uriString) {
133         try {
134             this.load(cacheIndexFile);
135         }
136         catch (IncompatibleIndexException | IOException e) {
137             log.warn("Error while reading from cache " + cacheIndexFile);
138         }
139         URI uri = asUri(uriString);
140         if (!this.index.containsKey(uri)) {
141             log.debug("Current cache: " + this.index.keySet().stream()
142                             .map(u ->"\"" + u + "\"")
143                     .collect(Collectors.joining(", ")) + " does not contain \"" + uri + "\"");
144             return null;
145         }
146         Path cachedFile = Paths.get(this.index.get(uri));
147         if (!Files.exists(baseDir.resolve(cachedFile))) {
148             log.debug("Cached version of " + uri + " is gone; deleting cache entry");
149             this.index.remove(uri);
150             try {
151                 this.load(cacheIndexFile);
152                 this.save();
153             } catch (IncompatibleIndexException e) {
154                 log.warn("Could not load index cache index file, it will be rewritten.");
155             } catch (IOException e) {
156                 log.warn("Unable to update cache.");
157             }
158         }
159         return asHttpCacheEntry(cachedFile, baseDir);
160     }
161 
162     /**
163      * Loads index from the file storage replacing absent in-memory entries.
164      * @param store file where index is persisted.
165      * @throws IncompatibleIndexException is the store cannot be read due to a deserialization issue
166      */
167     @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
168     private void load(final Path store) throws IncompatibleIndexException, IOException {
169         if (Files.exists(store) && Files.size(store) != 0L) {
170             try (
171                     final RandomAccessFile file = new RandomAccessFile(store.toFile(), "r");
172                     final FileChannel channel = file.getChannel();
173                     final FileLock ignored = channel.lock(0L, Long.MAX_VALUE, true);
174                     final ObjectInputStream deserialize = new ObjectInputStream(Files.newInputStream(store))
175             ) {
176                 Map<URI, String> newEntries = (Map<URI, String>) deserialize.readObject();
177                 newEntries.forEach(index::putIfAbsent);
178             } catch (final ClassNotFoundException | InvalidClassException e) {
179                 throw new IncompatibleIndexException(e);
180             }
181         }
182     }
183 
184     /**
185      * Saves current in-memory index to file based storage.
186      */
187     private void save() {
188         try (
189                 final FileOutputStream file = new FileOutputStream(this.cacheIndexFile.toFile());
190                 final ObjectOutput res = new ObjectOutputStream(file);
191                 final FileChannel channel = file.getChannel();
192                 final FileLock ignored = channel.lock()
193         ) {
194             res.writeObject(new HashMap<URI, String>(this.index));
195         } catch (final IOException ex) {
196             throw new IllegalStateException(ex);
197         }
198     }
199 
200     @Override
201     public void removeEntry(String key) {
202         assert false; // This method should not have been called
203     }
204 
205     @Override
206     public void updateEntry(String key, HttpCacheUpdateCallback callback) {
207         // do nothing
208     }
209 }
